___clientPorts.description: Ports used to listen for client requests.

___version.description: Version of etcd container which will be run

___ssl.description: Whether or not SSL is used for etcd traffic

___peerPorts.description: Ports used for peer to peer communication

___uuidToken.description: If true, uuidgen will be used to generate a unique token for each etcd cluster. uuidToken takes precedence over clusterToken, and if neither are specified then the etcd defaults are used.

___clusterToken.description: Token used during etcd cluster formation. This may be unsafe if an etcd cluster formation has to be restarted, or multiple clusters are created within the same VPC. It is highly recommended that the uuidToken option be used instead.
